segments.text: Over near the cabinets, a different scene is unfolding entirely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His tiny body is stretched as far as it can go towards an open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see his hand already inside, plucking out a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, her hand extended, eagerly waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She clearly expects to receive a share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, almost ready to tip over backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me nervous just watching him sway up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mischievous pair, planning their secret cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be quite a team, working together for this sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink remains totally unaware of their daring adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely a forbidden pleasure, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and break that plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The excitement of a stolen cookie must be quite powerful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, full of secret thrills.
segments.speaker: PAR
